name: Turtly - A Beach Fight
description:
Turtly - A Beach Fight [W.I.P]

It is a game about a turtle that will fight against all the garbage dumped on the beach.

The goal is to be able to clean the beach by fighting soda can monsters, plastic bottle monsters and avoiding plastic bags when diving into the depths of the sea.

Features
  • Demo Level
  • Boss Fight
How to Play

Note: Best played on Desktop with a Gamepad

Controllers Keyboard Gamepad Move WASD Left Thumbstick Jump / Interact Spacebar South Button (A on Xbox) Run Left Shift West Button (X on Xbox) Dash F North Button (Y on Xbox) Shoot Mouse (Left Button) RT Button Crouch S Down / D-Pad Down Pause Esc Start ("Menu" button on Xbox)
